ingredients.item: 2 medium Waitrose British Blacktail Free Range Eggs
2 slices Waitrose 1 White Sourdough Bread, toasted

instructions.step: Coarsely mash the avocado with a fork. Mix in the lime juice, salad onion and chilli flakes. Cover and set aside.

Bring a large pan of water to the boil over a high heat and add the vinegar. Crack each egg into a small bowl, then carefully slide into the water. Simmer very gently for 3-4 minutes before removing with a slotted spoon.
Meanwhile, spread the mashed avocado over the toast and top each slice with a poached egg. Grind over a little black pepper and serve straight away.
